title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Adaptive Learning Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve work-related math problems with over 80% accuracy using an adaptive learning system
Learners can diagnose and address individual weak areas through computer-adaptive assessments in asynchronous learning environments
Learners can design a mastery path (learning proficiency route) to achieve target math competencies within three days
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
